help.comment: TupleSpaceProxy allows a remote Tuplespace to appear as local.

methods.method: Registers for notifications of event ev on the proxied TupleSpace. See TupleSpace#notify
Reads tuple from the proxied TupleSpace. See TupleSpace#read.
Reads all tuples matching tuple from the proxied TupleSpace. See TupleSpace#read_all.
Takes tuple from the proxied TupleSpace. See TupleSpace#take.
Adds tuple to the proxied TupleSpace. See TupleSpace#write.
